issues.description: The problem statement requires a no-argument Farm constructor to initialize the ArrayList, and the provided Main stub calls new Farm(), but the solution only defines Farm(int initialCapacity) and omits a no-arg constructor. This mismatch prevents compilation with the starter Main and conflicts with the spec.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a no-argument constructor in Farm that initializes animals (e.g. public Farm() { this.animals = new ArrayList<>(); }) or adjust the spec and Main to match the parameterized constructor.
